alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 10:39AM CDT until June 18 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Eastern Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1038 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Paulding to Tuckers Crossing, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Mill Creek around 1045 AM CDT. Heidelberg around 1050 AM CDT. Stafford Springs around 1055 AM CDT. Goodwater around 1100 AM CDT. Shubuta around 1115 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
